Texts.Chs: 把^orange;奇迹草种子^reset;带回^orange;科学前哨站^reset;给^green;我^reset;。
Texts.Eng: Bring the ^orange;seeds^reset; to ^green;me^reset; at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;
I am in need of ^green;miracle grass seeds^reset; to try a new regeneration experiment. You'll find them at your ^orange;Gene Design Lab^reset;. Can you fetch me some?

Texts.Chs: 谢谢你，现在我可以继续进行我的科研项目。再次感谢你。
Texts.Eng: Thanks, now I can complete this research project and wow the investors!
